import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Formulario = ({ onSubmit }) => { function getYYYYMMDD() { const today = new Date(); return new Date(today.getTime() - today.getTimezoneOffset() * 60 * 1000) .toISOString() .split('T')[0]; } const initUser = { name: '', surname: '', email: '', password: '', address: '', prov: 'SC', age: '18', date: getYYYYMMDD().toString(), vehicle: 'coche', agree: false }; const [form, setFormState ] = useState(initUser); const handleSubmit = (e) => { const user = { name, surname, email, password, address, prov, date, age, vehicule, agree }; e.preventDefault(); // alert(`Formulario enviado ... ${name} ${surname}`) onSubmit(user); }; return (

setName(e.target.value)} />
setSurname(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
setAddress(e.target.value)} />
setAge(e.target.value)} />
setDate(e.target.value)} />

setVehicle(e.target.value)} />
setAgree(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default Formulario;
